title: Thurs Post Show (03-24-22)
itunes:title: Thurs Post Show (03-24-22)
description:
We settle the debate from yesterday with new audio evidence between Bobby and Amy. Bobby explains how the podcast will work now after listening to feedback from listeners. He found a way to please both feelings towards splitting the podcast. We also get into another argument with Eddie about the theory he shared earlier this week.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
We settle the debate from yesterday with new audio evidence between Bobby and Amy. Bobby explains how the podcast will work now after listening to feedback from listeners.
